system.description:
You tap into your innate connection to the afterlife, enabling you to communicate with the departed. You learn the spell @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.6ia3gup3j0m6oigb]{Speak with Dead} and it does not count against the number of spells you know.

Additionally, your affinity with the afterlife empowers your connection with the soul you are speaking to. When you cast this spell, you may ask one additional question of the corpse before it de-animates.
